short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the futuristic world of Mecha Mortis with a live wallpaper that brings robotic chaos to your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prepare for an epic transformation every time you open a new tab with the Mecha Mortis Brawl Stars live wallpaper! This extension immerses you in the high-tech, mech-inspired world of Mortis, where the undead brawler is reimagined as a robotic powerhouse. Watch as Mecha Mortis roams the screen with stunning animations, bringing his cybernetic fury and devastating moves to life in a way you've never seen before. Whether he's dashing across the screen or unleashing his special attacks, the action will keep you on your toes, just like in a real Brawl Stars match!

But it‚Äôs not just about the futuristic visuals‚Äîthis extension also delivers practical features to enhance your browsing experience. With customizable site shortcuts, you can easily access your favorite websites. The integrated Google search bar makes web browsing quick and convenient, while the clock and date widget helps you keep track of time in true Brawl Stars style.

Features:
ü§ñ Live Wallpaper: Mecha Mortis in animated action, bringing robotic chaos and Brawl Stars power-ups to your screen.

üîç Google Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web directly from your new tab with the built-in search bar.

üåê Site Shortcuts: Customizable shortcuts to access your favorite sites with just one click.

‚è∞ Clock & Date Widget: A sleek clock and date display to keep you on schedule, even while battling like Mecha Mortis.

Unleash the power of Mecha Mortis on your browser and turn every new tab into an action-packed Brawl Stars experience!
